title: Commerce
description: The entites related to buying and selling activity.

xdm:order.title: Order
xdm:order.description: The placed order for one or more products.

xdm:cartAbandons.description: A product list has been identified as no longer accessible (e.g purchasable) by the user.

xdm:checkouts.description: An action during a checkout process of a product list, there can be more than one checkout event if there are multiple steps in a checkout process. If there are multiple steps the event time information and referenced page or experience is used to identify the step individual events represent in order.

xdm:productListAdds.description: Addition of a product to the product list. Example a product is added to a shopping cart.

xdm:productListOpens.description: Initializations of a new product list. Example a shopping cart is created.

xdm:productListRemovals.description: Removal(s) of a product entry from a product list. Example a product is removed from a shopping cart.

xdm:productListReopens.description: A product list that was no longer accessible(abandoned) has been re-activated by the user. Example via a re-marketing activity.

xdm:productListViews.description: View(s) of a product-list has occurred.

xdm:productViews.description: View(s) of a product have occurred.

xdm:purchases.description: An order has been accepted. Purchase is the only required action in a commerce conversion. Purchase must have a product list referenced.

xdm:saveForLaters.description: Product list is saved for future use. Example a product wish list.
